fields.description:
Description:
Rotation device twice after "Animate Tab Group" button is pressed, gives incorrect size and view of Tab Groups. This bug also exists on 2.0.1 and 1.8.2.

Steps:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI-Tab Groups
3. Press "Animate Tab Group"
4. Rotate device on landscape mode
5. Rotate device on portrait mode

Expected result:
"Tab Groups" should be sized correctly

Actual result:
"Tab Groups" not sized correctly
